title: website: on the install from source page the user is told to check out go1.5.2
body:
In the [instructions to build go from source][1], the user is asked to call 

    git checkout go1.5.2

I guess this should be changed, especially since go1.5.3 was a severe security fix. 

Edit: typo

[1]: https://golang.org/doc/install/source#fetch
